title: 3 and Out - Can't Pay Baker, Deshaun/Tua Trade Talk, Rodgers Stays, Eddie O Smears, Week 7 Preview and 3 for the $$$
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Can't Pay Baker, Deshaun/Tua Trade Talk, Rodgers Stays, Eddie O Smears, Week 7 Preview and 3 for the $$$
description:
John reacts to the Browns beating the Broncos with their backups, why the game showed why Cleveland can't pay Baker big money, and why it's clear Teddy Bridgewater isn't an NFL starter. He also gives his take on Deshaun Watson to Miami rumors, what it means for Tua's future, why he sees Aaron Rodgers staying in Green Bay, why Ed Orgeron doesn't deserve the false media smears that surfaced during his firing, and which coach would be a home run at LSU. He also previews the top games in week 7, runs his 3 for the Money NFL games by Action Network sharp Stuckey, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
